text: I understand. It can be tough with your job. Have you thought about setting reminders on your phone or maybe using a pill organizer?

speaker: Clinician
text: That makes sense. Maybe we could look into a medication that fits better with your routine. Or, if it's easier, taking it at a consistent time when you're not driving, like before bed?
